description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Fleur is a cute and simple budget planner and tracker app. The app allows you to easily add daily expenses and income. You can also set a monthly budget, create multiple accounts and track your debt. Fleur is an all in one app that will help you manage your money.

Key Features:
- Minimal, elegant, and aesthetically pleasing design
- Easily log expenses and income
- Set a monthly budget
- View insights and understand spending habits
- View transaction history
- Add repeating transactions
- Create new categories
- iCloud sync
- No sign in required
- Easy search and filter

Read more about our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy here:
https://fleurbudget.com/privacy_terms.html

We are always there for you!
- If you are facing any issues or have questions, please feel free to email us. Hope you enjoy using our app as much as we do! :)

You can use the new Simple app with your usual Simple account. When you log in to your account, you’ll find all the goods and products you bought with the old Simple (Classic) app: mobile tickets and passes, event tickets, vignettes, insurances you’ve taken out, and your purchase history. 

You can use the new Simple app regardless of your bank: you can easily save bank cards issued by any bank and use them to pay for the services available via the application.


Services available in the renewed Simple app


Parking – payment of parking fees for public areas and indoor spaces countrywide:
- parking reservation and timing of expiry time,
- multiple vehicle registration numbers can be saved, 
- warning on zone boundary,
- location-based reminders.


e-Vignette – purchase of Hungarian motorway vignettes:
- for up to several vehicles, timing of the start of validity for weekly and monthly e-vignettes
- electronic invoice available,
- warning of the date of expiry of the vignette.

Mobile ticket/BKK – buy public transport mobile tickets and passes countrywide: 
- BKK passes and weekly and daily tickets, normal and time-based tickets
- Volánbusz intercity and local bus tickets and passes,
- tickets and passes from many other local operators.

Food ordering – order food with the app:
- in nearly 800 cities and towns across the country, 
- from the full range of Falatozz.hu,
- delivery even to multiple addresses.

Vehicle assistance insurance (breakdown assistance):
- in cooperation with the insurance provider Groupama,
- for vehicles up to 15 years old.

Device insurance for mobile phones: 
- in cooperation with the insurance provider Magyar Posta Biztosító 
- against theft and breakage, not just for new devices
- with a monthly payment option.

QR code payment – pay for your online SimplePay purchases quickly and easily using Simple app.

Money orders – with new functions: 
- save money orders for later payment, 
- payment of partially filled money orders.

Loyalty card:
- save any barcode loyalty card in the app.

OTP SZÉP card check balance service.

OTP Health Fund – balance top-up.


You can run Simple and Simple Classic applications on your device simultaneously.


Our Customer Service is available 24/7 via the usual contact details!

A legújabb OTP SZÉP kártya alkalmazással könnyedén követheted az aktuális egyenlegedet és a tranzakcióidat, előleget utalhatsz, ellenőrizheted, hogy mekkora összeget nem használtál még fel a két évvel korábbi juttatásaidból, a térképes keresővel pedig elfogadóhelyeket is kereshetsz.
Az alkalmazás kizárólag az OTP SZÉP kártyabirtokosok számára használható.
 
Már regisztráltál a honlapunkon?
Ha már van OTP SZÉP Portál (www.otpportalok.hu) regisztrációd, akkor az alkalmazáson belül nem szükséges újra regisztrálnod, az azonosítást követően a Portálon használt e-mail címeddel és jelszavaddal az appba is be tudsz lépni. Az azonosításhoz első alkalommal szükséged lesz a kártyaszámodra és a születési dátumodra. A későbbiekben a belépéshez választhatsz ujjlenyomat- vagy arcfelismerést is, ha a telefonodnak van ilyen funkciója.
 
Mire van szükséged új regisztrálóként?
 az OTP SZÉP kártyád 16 jegyű kártyaszámára,
a születési dátumodra,
és egy működő e-mail címre.
A kártyaszám és a születési dátum megadása után kövesd a regisztrációhoz szükséges további lépéseket az alkalmazáson belül. A regisztráció során meg kell majd adnod az e-mail címed és egy jelszót, el kell fogadnod az adatkezelési tájékoztatót, meg kell adnod az e-mailben kapott megerősítő kódot.  Ha telefonod rendelkezik ujjlenyomat-olvasóval, vagy arcfelismerővel, akkor dönthetsz úgy is, hogy a későbbi belépésekor így azonosítod magad. 
A regisztrációt követően az internetes Portálra is beléphetsz a megadott e-mail címmel és jelszóval.

További információk a regisztrációról: https://magan.szepkartya.otpportalok.hu/gyakori-kerdesek/

Milyen technikai feltételek szükségesek az alkalmazás telepítéséhez?
minimum iOS 10.0-ás operációs rendszer

OTP MobilBank

Download the app and apply for a personal bank account from your mobile, even with a selfie!

Join the nearly 2 million users and manage your daily finances with the OTP MobilBank app!

Bank simply, digitally!

Why choose OTP MobilBank?

With OTP MobilBank, managing your finances has never been easier and more convenient. Whether it’s opening an account, handling transactions, or managing your savings, everything is easily accessible in one place on your mobile.

Key features and benefits:
•	Account opening with selfie identification: Open a bank account from anywhere with just a selfie. Just a few steps and you're done!
•	Expense tracker: Do you want to know how much you spend in each month? The app can automatically categorises your expenses, so making your finances more transparent.
•	Push notifications: Receiving instant push notifications about every card transactions and account movements, keeping you always up to date.
•	Transaction history: See all transactions in one place, transparently, including pending and rejected items.
•	QR code bill payment: Pay your postal bills quickly and conveniently with the QR code payment option.
•	OpenBank service: Get a comprehensive view of your finances! With the OpenBank service, you can also view the balances of your current accounts held with other banks, so all your financial data is available in one place.

More useful features:
•	Instant and scheduled domestic HUF transfers
•	Querying, blocking, and setting daily limits for your bank card 
•	Creating and modifying direct debit orders
•	Viewing quick balance without logging in
•	Querying your account details and credit limits
•	Managing savings (securities, fixed deposits)
•	Purchasing government bonds, bonds, and investment funds
•	Applying for personal loans
•	Checking transactions
•	Arranging travel and lifestyle insurance
•	Applying for car prize deposits
•	Login into the new OTP InternetBank service with QR code scanning or by push notification
•	Setting up shopping discounts
•	Querying currency/exchange rates
•	ATM and branch locator
•	Booking branch appointments

The OTP MobilBank is still evolving, new features and opportunities are constantly added to enhance the user experience. Registration is required, which you can complete on your mobile device after downloading and opening the app. To register, you need an OTPdirekt internet banking contract, so have your contract details ready for the registration.

You can read more about the OTP MobilBank app here : https://www.otpbank.hu/portal/hu/Uj-IBMB-kisokos/ 

By downloading and using the app, you accept the OTP Bank "Privacy Policy," which provides information about the handling of your personal data.

Invest in more than 5,500+ Stocks & ETFs with low fees, earn interest on uninvested cash, and manage GBP, EUR & USD in a multi-currency account.

Investing as it should be:
- 5,500+ stocks & ETFs across the UK, US & Europe
- No ETF execution fees (other fees may apply)
- Tax-efficient investing with Stocks & Shares ISA and Cash ISA
- Max 1 £€$ execution fee to buy stocks 
- Multi-currency investing – hold GBP, EUR & USD
- Earn interest on cash with Vaults (managed by BlackRock)
- Seamless web and mobile investing app

Investing for businesses:
- High interest Money Market Funds with instant access in most cases (Terms apply)
- Multi-user access – add your accountant
- Same transparent pricing as for personal account 
- Seamless web and mobile investing

Authorised & Regulated:
- Investor protection: FSCS (£85,000)
- Your cash and investments are held in a segregated client account
- Authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN 987226) 
- Lightyear is protected by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS) 

We are in the wealth creation business. Making sure whoever you are, wherever you are, Lightyear is the best place for you to grow your money for a better future.

We create successful investors!

Capital at risk. Lightyear UK Ltd (UK) & Lightyear Europe AS (EU) provide investment services. Terms apply – lightyear.com/terms. Seek financial advice if unsure.

Csekk- és számlabefizetés egyszerűen, bankkártyával



Az iCsekk alkalmazás segítségével:
Befizetheti QR-kóddal ellátott postai csekkjeit és iCsekk QR-kóddal ellátott számláit a csekken vagy a számlán található QR-kód beolvasásával.
Összekapcsolhatja a Díjnet fiókját az iCsekk-kel, így a Díjnetben bemutatott számlát is megtekintheti és befizetheti.
Feltöltheti mobiltelefon egyenlegét a „Mobil feltöltés” menüpontban.


Regisztráljon e-mail címe és egy belépési jelszó megadásával, és már kezdheti is a befizetéseket! 


Fizetés
Az alkalmazás segítségével internetes fizetésre alkalmas bankkártyájának használatával befizetheti csekkjeit, elektronikus és papír alapú számláit, vagy feltöltheti mobiltelefon egyenlegét is.


A fizetési felületet a SimplePay biztosítja – adja meg adatait vagy regisztrálja bankkártyáját, hogy még egyszerűbb legyen a fizetés.


Az alkalmazásban a fizetési mód választó felületen beállíthatja alapértelmezett fizetési módját, gyorsítva a fizetés folyamatát. 

Kifizetett és várakozó tételek

A korábban befizetett csekkeket és számlákat a „Fizetett tételek” menüpont alatt tekintheti meg, elmentett vagy időközben beérkezett tranzakcióit pedig a „Várakozó tételek” menüpontban találja. Letöltheti korábbi befizetéseinek adatait.



Részlegesen kitöltött csekkek befizetése
Az alkalmazás ezentúl lehetőséget biztosít a részlegesen kitöltött csekkek befizetésére is, melyhez a QR-kód lefényképezése után szükséges néhány adat megadása, mint pl. összeg, név és cím.
Újdonság
Az alkalmazásban mostantól egy fizetési tranzakcióval több csekk befizetése is lehetséges (kosárfizetés), valamint több QR kódot is be lehet olvasni egymást követően. 
Az ÉnPostám Hűségkártyája azonosítóját (LÜA) már a kártya vonalkódjának a beolvasásával is megteheti, valamint hűségkártya azonosítást követően az alkalmazásban megjelenik a virtuális hűségkártyája, lekérdezheti pontegyenlegét és ponttörténetét, emellett megtekintheti az aktuális kedvezményeket.
Letölthető a kifizetett csekkek feladóvevénye (befizetési bizonylat).


Köszönjük, hogy minket választ!




Gyakran ismételt kérdések



Mennyibe kerül ez nekem?
Az iCsekk alkalmazás használata ingyenes, ugyanakkor letöltése és használata adatforgalommal jár. Felhívjuk figyelmét, hogy az iCsekk alkalmazáson keresztül indított fizetés bankkártyás vásárlásnak minősül, melynek díja bankonként eltérő lehet.


Mennyire biztonságos?
A rendszer biztonsági megoldásai a banki rendszerek biztonsági megoldásaival egyenértékűek.


Minden tranzakcióról kapok visszaigazolást?
Igen, az alkalmazás minden tranzakció eredményéről visszajelzést ad az applikáció felületén, a sikeres tranzakciókról pedig e-mail üzenetet küld. 


Milyen kártyával tudok fizetni?
Az iCsekk alkalmazásban indított fizetések lebonyolításához internetes fizetésre alkalmas bankkártyák használhatók fel.

MobilKincstár
Hungarian State Treasury –  2025
Finance


Description
MobilKincstár serves as the official mobile application-based online government bond distribution channel of the Hungarian State Treasury. 

Available services for non-registered clients:
- Online securities registry account opening
-	Demo mode
Additional services for registered clients:
- Initiating government security and cash related transactions (purchasing and selling government securities, initiating transfers)
-	Request information about the client’s portfolio 
-	Reviewing transaction history


MobilKincstár is available for clients who request access either personally at any customer service centres of the government securities distribution offices of the Hungarian Treasury or remotely via the Client Gate service.

The MobilKincstar application can be run and used under normal using mobile device, which device suits the prescribed min requirements.

Tech parameters:
Resolution: min (640x1136)
Operating system: min. iOS 15

For any further information about our service, please visit our homepage:
https://www.allamkincstar.gov.hu/

If you have any predecessor MBH Netbank contract, manage your daily finances from anywhere, at any time, comfortably on the unified mobile application service, the MBH Bank App.

Please never share your bank login details and passwords with anyone, and never access the netbank via a link or from an internet search engine.

Main functions:
•	Add Customers and switch between them
•	View account balance
•	HUF transfer to partners and new partners
•	Transfer between HUF accounts
•	Biometric authentication
•	Travel insurance
•	Add card to Apple Wallet
•	View account history (with history filter)
•	Account information
•	Hidden account balances 
•	Change of account user
•	Credit and debit card information, activation and suspension
•	Adjustment of credit and debit card cash withdrawal limits, purchases limits and online limits
•	Set of online payment password
•	Change of language (English, Hungarian)
•	List of direct debits and standing orders
•	Login to the internetbank with QR code or Push
•	Manage secondary account identifiers
•	Account statements
•	Cancellation of future HUF transfers
•	Third parties (OpenAPI)

Mobil App push notifications:
•	Internetbank transactions,
•	Online purchases (3DSecure),
•	Transfers received from third parties (OpenAPI) 

Important! The availability of the listed features is different in the customer profiles. You can view the grouping of the functions in our user manual, which is available from our website.

-----------------------

How to activate the application?
	• Download and launch the application. 
	• As a first step, please provide the first 8 digits of your card or account number to identify which customer you would like to log into the application
	• Next, please provide your ID and password used in the MBH Netbank.
	• You will receive a one-time password to your phone number set in the MBH Netbank. You will need this password when the application requires you to provide the password sent in text message. 101 Bank ID: if you are a new user and have not loged in the Internetbank before, you will need to change your initial password on the next screen.
	• When logging in to the application, please provide a unique ID (mPIN) consisting of six digits. You will use this mPIN to access the application thereafter. 
	• The activation of the application ends upon the confirmation of your mPIN and you will enter the application for the first time.
	• During the sign in process, you have the option to enable the Touch ID / Face ID authentication.

------------------------

Your opinion is important to us. We will constantly extend the available services based on the received feedback. Please help us and share your opinion and suggestions at app@mbhbank.hu.

Please note that the maximum amount of HUF transfer per day in the appliaction for retail customers differs from which Customer you use in the application, for details, please check the user manual, which is available from our website.

We here by inform you, that the comments written in the Apple Store are not handled as official complaints. In case of complaints, please contact us at app@mbhbank.hu e-mail address or call our customer support on + 36-1-373-3399 phone number. 

------------------------

Technical conditions:
	• At least iOS 13.0 version 
	• The use of the application on devices with Jailbreaked operating systems is not supported in order to protect our clients, as, in this case, the risks of accessing data regarding their bank accounts escalate.
	• The existence of one of MBH Netbank service is a prerequisite for the use of MBH Bank App.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)
Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

Revolut is the money app designed to spend, save, and set money aside.

What's in store:
• Get your own customisable debit card and virtual cards to add to your Apple or Google Wallet (personalisation fees may apply)
• Send money between friends on Revolut (minimum age restriction applies)
• Receive money from everyone — even if they’re not on Revolut — with Payment Links
• Save and earn with a Savings account
• Get a 360º view of your money with Analytics
• If you’re in the UK, you can move to the main app once you turn 16

 
How does it work?
1. Download this app and create an account (if you're below the age of data consent, your parent will need to create an account for you from their Revolut app. You can check the age of data consent in your country below)
2. Get approved by your parent or guardian
3. Choose a debit card and customise it with text, stickers, and your own sketches (personalisation fees may apply), then order it from your parent's app
4. Add your card to Apple or Google Wallet to start spending straight away (minimum age restriction applies)
 
Parents and guardians, this part's for you ↓
With Revolut, they can manage their money independently, under your supervision.
Teens above the age of data consent can sign up themselves, but you'll have access to security controls, like spending notifications, in-app card freezes, and many other features to give you peace of mind.
If you have teens below the age of data consent, you can create an account for them from your Revolut app. Here’s how: 
1. Have them download this app and create an account
2. Approve their account from your Revolut app
3. Order their prepaid debit card from your app (personalisation fees may apply)

Find your country's age of data consent ↓

In Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Gibraltar, Iceland, Latvia, Malta, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or the United States:
• Teens aged 13+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Teens aged 12 or under (minimum age restrictions apply) will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 13+

In Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Italy, Lithuania, or Spain:
• Teens aged 14+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 13 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 14+

In Australia, Czech Republic, Greece, or Slovenia:
• Teens aged 15+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 14 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 15+ (referrals subject to feature availability in your country)

In Croatia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Romania, or Slovakia:
• Teens aged 16 and above can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those ages 15 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 16+

developer: Alfa Vienna Insurance Group Biztosito Zrt.
description:
Gyors belépés, gondtalan ügyintézés: ez az AlfaGo+

Megújult alkalmazásunkban letisztult felület, gyorsabb működés és intuitív funkciók segítik abban, hogy biztosítási ügyeit még egyszerűbben intézhesse.

► GYORS BELÉPÉS BIOMETRIKUS AZONOSÍTÁSSAL Válassza az ujjlenyomattal vagy arcfelismeréssel történő azonosítást a kényelmes és azonnali használathoz.

► GOMBNYOMÁSRA SEGÍTSÉG Ha rendelkezik Otthoni Vészelhárítás kiegészítővel, az alkalmazásból közvetlenül hívhat szakembert és 24 órán belül megszervezzük a segítségnyújtást, valamint a helyreállítást.

► NYARALNI MEGY?  Kösse meg alkalmazásunkban az utasbiztosítását, és vegye igénybe kedvezményét. 

► EXTRA KEDVEZMÉNYEK AZ ALKALMAZÁSBAN AlfaGo+ felhasználóként további előnyöket élvezhet: kuponok, ajánlatok várják az alkalmazásban.

► ÉRTESÍTÉSEK Push értesítést állíthat be, így egyetlen fontos információról, határidőről sem marad le.

► EGYSZERŰ DÍJFIZETÉS Értesítést küldünk esedékes díjáról, melyet azonnal be is fizethet.

► KÁRSTÁTUSZ KÖVETÉS Bejelentett lakás- vagy gépjárműkár esetén mindig naprakész információkat talál az appban.

► DIGITÁLIS IGAZOLÁSOK Zöldkártya, igazolólap, létezésigazolás: minden szükséges dokumentumot elérhet egy helyen, a mobilján.

► PAPÍRMENTES ÜGYINTÉZÉS Az e-kapcsolat szolgáltatásnak köszönhetően minden biztosítással kapcsolatos küldeményt megtalál a fiókjában kényelmesen, elektronikusan.

► BIZTOSÍTÁSOK EGY HELYEN Kalkulálhat és akár új biztosítást is köthet az alkalmazásból indítva.

► MAXIMÁLIS ADATBIZTONSÁG Rendszereink szigorú adatvédelmi előírások szerint működnek, és folyamatosan fejlesztjük őket, hogy adatai biztonságban legyenek.

►► BELÉPÉS / REGISZTRÁCIÓ ◄◄

Az AlfaGo+ használatához online ügyfélszolgálati regisztráció szükséges: ugyfelszolgalat.alfa.hu
Amennyiben már rendelkezik hozzáféréssel, a belépéshez adja meg e-mail címét és jelszavát, vagy használja a biometrikus azonosítást (ujjlenyomat vagy arcfelismerés) a kényelmesebb belépéshez.

________________________

Dear international users, please note:
AlfaGo+ is developed by Alfa Biztosító, a Hungarian insurance company. The app is currently available in Hungarian and designed for use by customers living in Hungary. Thank you for your understanding!

developer: Erste Bank Hungary Zartkoruen mukodo Reszvenytarsasag
description:
Hello, I'm George, Erste Bank's internet banking and mobile application service! 

My goal is to get the most out of yourself and your finances, which is why I am constantly expanding my features. Whether it's everyday banking, savings, or insurance, I strive to put all the solutions in your hands and help you where you need it.

Thanks to the latest "Selfie bank account opening" development, you can now even open an account in a few minutes - without visiting the branch.

List of available functions:

• Selfie bank account opening
• Transfer / Transfer
• Conversion between own currency accounts
• Management of standing and direct debit orders
• Referral recording with QR code photography
• SEPA transfer
• Aggregation by spending categories and merchants
• An attachment and a unique #hashtag can be attached to transactions
• Secondary account ID management
• Payment request management
• Watchdog service
• Account statement download
• Debit and credit card application
• Opening a target deposit
• Apple Pay bank card digitization 
• Change primary account
• Time-locked card limit setting
• Bank card PIN code display
• Credit card loyalty program with points redemption
• Moneyback program
• Displaying active insurances and concluding new ones
• Identified call initiation from the application
• Sending messages to the bank and chatting with Mira, Erstebank's digital assistant
• Branch and ATM locator

What will you need when registering?
After downloading, you only have to enter your e-channel ID and password, and the freedom of banking is already yours.

5 stars service? I count on your opinion!
The goal is to use the best possible banking app, and you can help with this! Please, if you have a moment, rate my operation here on the store's interface with stars. Thank you very much!

Do you need a well-functioning relationship?
If you would like to receive answers to your questions about usage and/or to know that your comments about the operation will be included in the development, then write an email with the subject "George feedback" here: -> erste@erstebank.hu

Want to know more?
More useful information about me -> www.erstebank.hu/george

Now I've given you all the basic information, we'll see you on the other side after the download.

I'm already waiting!

George

Your bank account can be just as easily available as your phone is!

With K&H mobilbank application you can:

- check your account balance
- modify of your daily bankcard limits
- launch domestic forint payments to any Hungarian bank account number or secondary identifier
- comfortable and safe login to K&H e-bank without even touching the keyboard of your computer
- easily check your card’s PIN number
- activate, suspend or unsuspend and cancel your card in only few steps
- quickly purchase and validate public transport tickets or passes
- if you are also a business client at K&H Bank, you can easily switch among your private and your business accounts
- contact us through an authenticated channel with K&H quick call function
- online cash loan request, that takes only a few minutes, there is no need for visiting a branch, with instant disbursement.
- possibility to choose between mPIN code or biometric authentication methods even during login or transaction signing.

You can access the following useful functions even without login:

- K&H branch and ATM locator (with global positioning) and appointment booking
- General information about K&H Bank
- K&H+ ticket validation


No registration is needed to use K&H mobilbank, you can automatically use it with K&H e-bank access rights.The service has to be activated before the first login. The activation can be completed using the same identities as you use in K&H e-bank. If none of them are available, you can also launch the activation process in e-bank.During the activation you have to set an mPIN code. This will later be used to login, e-bank login and transaction signing.


Technical requirements: iPhone 6s or later devices, requiring min. iOS 15.0 operation system version.

Please note: You can no longer access K&H mobilbank on smart phones with modified (jailbraked) systems.

Save money effortlessly! Spendee is a FREE budgeting app already loved by almost 3.000.000 people around the world that track their spendings and optimize their budgets.

Seeing all your financial habits enables you to stick to your goals and be organized in what's important. Take responsibility and know exactly where your money goes. With Spendee, you can be your own money manager. It's that easy!
 
MAKE YOUR MONEY SHINE

• See All of Your Money in One Place
Connect Spendee with your online banking, E-Wallet (e.g. PayPal) or crypto-wallet (e.g. Coinbase) and see your wealth in one place.

• Organize & Analyze Your Expenses
We'll help you see your finances in the big picture! Imagine your data being automatically categorized, displayed in simple infographics, stylish graphs and clever insights that help you on your way to your dream savings and proper financial health! 

• Optimize Your Spendings
Save money for categories you spend the most on by creating budgets and sticking to them! We'll notify you on your progress to make sure you are in green numbers and maintaining positive cash flow.

• Learn Through Personal Insights
Embrace financial awareness. Let us become your best financial friend which proactively helps you to manage your personal finances and build a sustainable emergency fund. We're ready to give you tips & tricks to help you with your daily decision making. 

MORE KEY FEATURES 

• Budgets - to help you stick to your financial goals
• Wallets - organize your cash, bank accounts or different financial occasions 
• Shared Finances - to efficiently manage money with partners or flatmates
• Multiple Currencies - to handle vacation finances with ease
• Labels - to mark and analyse transactions in more depth
• Dark Mode - to enjoy in eye friendly environment
• Web Version - to see your finances on a bigger screen
• Secure Data Sync - to keep your details private, confidential and safe
 
AWARD WINNING DESIGN

Starting with Spendee is easy thanks to its intuitive design. And the more you use it, the more valuable it gets, rewarding you with attractive charts that show you where your money is going, how you're doing compared to previous periods & much more. We believe in beautiful design - and thanks to that, we'll guide you to better financial decisions with ease.

Download Spendee now! Sync your bank account to be your own money manager & get ahead of your finances. It's easy, effective and enables you to save and plan for the future. 

Follow us on our social media @spendeeapp or email us at hello@spendee.com 

Terms of Use: https://www.spendee.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://www.spendee.com/privacy-policy
Help centre: https://help.spendee.com

Open personal (over the age of 18) or business bank account within 20 minutes with selfie in Hungarian

Take your ID and address card, for business account also have your tax number.
1.	Click on "Open new account" button
2.	Select your account and card, and provide your contact info
3.	Accept the terms
4.	Scan your documents and the NFC chip of your ID
5.	Take a selfie and sign the contract with an SMS code
6.	Log in with the provided code and start using your account
Manage your daily banking simple, comfortable and quick, all around the day!
. Use it for transfers, credit card pay off, standing order or direct debit, or just simply track your finances with it. Access to your data and transactions are protected via PIN code or biometric authentication.

----------- 

YOU UNDERSTAND WHERE YOUR MONEY GOES. 

We know people need to get a more meaningful view on their money than a simple transactions list. 

We created a space in the app called Analytics to let you see how you spend your money. By automated categorisation and grouping spending in different ways you can easily see where you might have spent a lot. 

----------- 

YOU FIND EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE IN THE MY PRODUCTS PAGE. 

We put all Raiffeisen bank accounts, debit cards, credit cards and term deposits in one place so that you can manage them with ease. 

You can: 

-share your account details with others 
-easily change your card limits whenever you want 
-view your overdraft 
-create term deposit, terminate or withdraw it 
-activate, block or unlock your cards. 

----------- 

YOU GET THINGS DONE WITH LESS EFFORT WITH THESE FUNCTIONS. 

-Login and authorize easily using TouchID or FaceID or PIN code 
-Make transfer even to email, mobile number, tax number or ID are liked to bank accounts. 
-Manage card limits 
-Pay-off your credit card 
-Apply for loans 
-You can view, create and delete existing Standing Orders. 
-You can manage Term Deposits. 
-You can view, create and delete Direct debits. 
-The items waiting for collection above the limit you set can be approved or rejected. 
-Get special offer to exchange currencies between own accounts. 
-Generate QR codes to request payment and send payment by scanning QR code. 
-Manage, send and receive payment requests. 
-Allow the internetbank login and authorize the transactions. 
-Online purchases can be authorized in the mobile application. 
-We send you a push notification about the task of the authorization. 

----------- 

TO ACTIVATE OUR NEW MOBILE APP YOU NEED: 

-maintaining the account in Raiffeisen Bank Hungary 
-bank account or credit card in Raiffeisen Bank Hungary 
-internet banking service - valid credentials 
-a smartphone operating on iOS 15.0 or later 

----------- 

Following app functions are also available with joint signature: HUF, SEPA payments, transfer between own accounts payments request. 

Registration: download the app, log in with your internet banking credentials. Activate Mobile Token by choose a PIN code. The Mobile token PIN code can be substituted with Touch ID or FaceID. 

----------- 

We use technology creatively to bring new things to life and make your daily banking experience even better. Stay tuned, we have more coming soon. If you like us, give us a rating! If we can improve it, let us know via email to info@raiffeisen.hu.

About XTB
XTB is a global financial institution trusted by over 1.7 million clients. We provide access to a wide range of investment options including stocks, ETFs,CFD trading on currencies, commodities, indices, and more. Our platform also includes Investment Plans, interest on uninvested funds and ISA. All of this is available in one easy-to-use app — a single, powerful ecosystem where your money works.

Buy stocks and ETFs commission-free
The XTB app gives you access to over 4500 stocks and ETFs from 16 major exchanges around the world. Invest in stocks and ETFs with 0% commission.*

Choose from thousands of CFDs
Trade CFDs based on currency pairs (Forex), commodities, indices, stocks, and ETFs.

Make the most of our savings solutions:

Investment Plans
At XTB, you can create a personalised Investment Plan that will help you regularly set aside small amounts, invest passively and reach your desired goals, like: travel, retirement, or a new house.

Interest on free funds
You can profit while waiting for the perfect investment opportunity. All your uninvested funds earn interest.

Flexible Stocks & Shares ISA
An ISA  is a tax-efficient savings and investment account that allows you to earn interest or returns without paying tax on them.

2FA - an extra layer of security
We implemented 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) through SMS verification to ensure that no one gains unauthorized access to your XTB account. 

Safe and secure deposits and withdrawals
Make a deposit instantly by credit/debit cards like Visa/Mastercard. Easily transfer funds between sub-accounts within XTB or withdraw to your personal bank account - all safely and securely. 

24h/5 support
Our customer service team offers support in 18 languages and is available 24/5 hours a day,  via email, chat or phone.

Free demo account
Open a free demo account in seconds and explore your investment ideas with zero risk. Experience real market conditions without using your own capital. When you’re ready, open a real  XTB account for free and start putting your money to work for real.

Trainings and webinars
Explore our extensive video library and gain access to hundreds of hours of educational webinars. Learn at your own pace with clear, structured content . 

Market news and analysis
Get breaking news and read professional market analysis from our award-winning research team.

Advanced charts and technical analysis
Find the best investment opportunities using over 35 indicators, different chart types, advanced technical analysis, and other features in the app.

Additional investing tools
Stay ahead with our suite of investing tools: track key macroeconomic events with the Economic Calendar, manage risk and plan using the Investor’s Calculator, set real-time Price Alerts to catch market moves and explore global Market Sentiment to make more informed decisions.

*For monthly turnover up to 100,000 EUR. Transactions above this limit will be charged a commission of 0.2% (minimum 10 GBP).
**CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 
72% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider.
You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Your capital is at risk. The value of your investments may go up or down.Tax treatment depends on your individual circumstances and ISA regulations which may change.T&Cs apply.

Válaszd a Gránit Bankot és a digitális bankolás új dimenzióját!
Töltsd le a Gránit eBank applikációt, és intézd napi pénzügyeidet egyszerűen és kényelmesen, díjnyertes mobilbanki applikációnk segítségével!


ÚJDONSÁGOK:
-	Rendszeres átutalási megbízások létrehozása az applikációban
-	Csoportos beszedések, melyekkel megbízhatod szolgáltatódat, hogy meghatározott időszakonként automatikusan beszedje a bankszámládról a fizetendő összeget.

Számlanyitás:
-	Számlanyitás szelfis azonosítással: Új típusú elektronikus személyazonosító igazolvánnyal vagy DÁP azonosítással pár perc alatt megnyithatod a számlád egy szelfi készítésével, amikor neked kényelmes, akár nyitvatartási időn kívül is. Az így nyitott bankszámla teljes értékű bankszámlaként használható, éppúgy, mint a Videóbankon vagy a bankfiókban nyitott bankszámla.
-	A forintszámlád mellé devizaszámlát is nyitnál? Néhány kattintással euró, USA dollár, svájci frank, angol font vagy akár román lej alapú devizaszámlát is nyithatsz az app-ban. Az EUR és USD alapú devizaszámlákhoz akár azonnal használható devizakártyát is igényelhetsz.

Megbízások:
-	Villámgyors forint és deviza átutalások, amelyeket sablonokkal még egyszerűbbé tehetsz.
-	Válts devizapiaci középárfolyamon eurót, USA dollárt, svájci frankot, angol fontot vagy román lejt meglévő devizaszámládra banki munkanapokon 9 és 17 óra között a megadott havi limitig.
-	Visszakeresheted, majd elutalhatod mentett qvik megbízásaidat az érvényességi idejükön belül.
-	Az utaláshoz rögzíthetsz másodlagos azonosítót (e-mail cím, mobiltelefonszám, adóazonosító/adószám), és indíthatsz is másodlagos azonosítóra tranzakciót, amennyiben a címzett (kedvezményezett) is rögzített ilyet a bankjánál.

Kártyaszolgáltatások:
-	Gránit Digital Kártyaszolgáltatás: új ügyfélként bankkártyádat akár már a számlanyitás másnapján használhatod online vásárlásra, vagy érintéses mobilfizetéssel az üzletekben!
-	Már van bankkártyád, de további forint, prémium vagy devizakártyát igényelnél? A kártyák menüpontban lapozz az „Azonnali bankkártya igényléshez”, és az igényelt új bankkártyádat akár azonnal használhatod digitálisan.
-	Elfelejtetted a bankkártyád PIN kódját? Az appban bármikor ellenőrizheted.
-	Online vásárolsz, de nincs nálad a fizikai bankkártyád? Nézd meg a kártyaadatokat az appban!
-	Még biztonságosabban vásárolnál online? Igényelj néhány kattintással Egyszer használatos kártyát az appban, és tudd biztonságban kártyád adatait!
-	A csekkbefizetés is lehet digitális! Olvasd be a sárga vagy fehér csekket kamerád segítségével, amely alapján az app egy automatikus átutalási megbízást készít.

Megtakarítások, befektetések:
-	Kösd le a kiválasztott bankbetétet néhány kattintással, vagy nyiss megtakarítási számlát, de indíthatsz akár rendszeres megtakarítást is az app-ban.
-	Nyiss értékpapírszámlát az app-ban, és válogass az elérhető állampapírok, befektetési jegyek, és részvények között!

További funkciók:
-	Qvik fizetési megoldást nyújtunk ügyfeleink számára, amely lehetővé teszi a QR-kód, deeplink (ún. applikáción belüli link) és NFC alapú azonnali fizetést, valamint a már ismert qvik-kérelmet a kereskedelmi vásárlások és számlabefizetések során.
-	Pénzügyek áttekintése: Elemezd naprakészen költéseidet és bevételeidet! A tranzakciókról ingyenes üzenetet kaphatsz az applikáción belül, számlatörténeted bármikor elérheted.
-	Mobilfizetés: Fizess egyszerűen és kényelmesen, egyetlen érintéssel okostelefonoddal a Wallet alkalmazás segítségével!
-	Biztonság: A bankkártya limiteket bármikor egy mozdulattal átállíthatod, vagy akár zárolhatod is bankkártyád, majd fizetéshez könnyedén fel is oldhatod. Az alkalmazás biztonságos használatáról PIN kód, ujjlenyomat olvasó vagy Face ID gondoskodik.
-	Kövesd a bankkártyás költéseiddel járó CO2 kibocsátást az Öko Kalkulátorban, amelyet faültetésre szánt adománnyal semlegesíthetsz!



A tájékoztatás nem teljes körű, további részletek a www.granitbank.hu/ebank oldalon találhatóak.

Az Ominimo applikáció célja, hogy egyszerűbbé, átláthatóbbá és kényelmesebbé tegye a biztosítási ügyintézést és kommunikációt. Azon dolgozunk, hogy ügyfeleink minden igényét kielégítsük, és a legmagasabb szintű ügyfélszolgálatot nyújtsuk.

Az applikáció könnyű hozzáférést biztosít a biztosítási szerződésedhez, dokumentumaidhoz, például a kötvényedhez és zöldkártyádhoz.
A díjfizetés állapotát is könnyen ellenőrizheted az applikáció segítségével a Fizetés állapota menüpontban és akár el is indíthatod a befizetést.
Pár kattintással frissítheted elérhetőségeidet, illetve jelezheted, ha a személyes adataid vagy a járműved adatai változtak.
Az applikáció segítségével jelezheted továbbá, ha biztosításodat szüneteltetni szeretnéd vagy esetleg felmondanád.

Ha esetleg baleset okozója voltál, akkor az applikáción keresztül pár kattintással segíthetsz a másik félnek a kárbejelentés elindításában.

Ha még nincs nálunk biztosításod, akkor az applikáción keresztül könnyen elérheted az Ominimo felületét, ahol akár fél perc alatt kalkulálhatsz és percek alatt megkötheted biztosításodat.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

The security of our customers is always our top priority.

Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy and sell bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to buy and sell cryptocurrencies.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.

A K&H Számlanyitás alkalmazással rövid idő alatt, bárhol, bármikor nyithatsz online bankszámlát.(1)

Gyorsan és egyszerűen: személyi igazolványra vagy útlevélre, lakcímkártyára, vagy külföldi lakcímet igazoló dokumentumra, stabil internetkapcsolatra, és kamerás telefonra (élő telefonszámmal), valamint e-mail címre van szükséged.

Az online számlanyitás során távoli (közvetett) ügyfélazonosítást végzünk, videóhívás nélkül.

Az okmányaidról fénykép készül, a valódiságukat ellenőrizzük a biztonsági elemek segítségével. A szelfin kívül mozgóképet is készítünk rólad, hogy senki se élhessen vissza személyazonosságoddal. A nyilatkozatokat és szerződéseket elektronikusan bocsájtjuk a rendelkezésedre.

Amennyiben adataidat sikeresen be tudjuk olvasni NFC-vel (NFC-s telefon és NFC képes okmány szükséges), korlátozások nélkül tudsz online bankszámlát nyitni. A folyamat végén azonnal elérhetővé válik az élő bankszámlád és a digitalizált bankkártyád, így pár kattintás után a K&H Apple Pay segítségével azonnal fizethetsz.

A fizikai bankkártyádat a számlanyitást követően postázzuk, a hozzá tartozó PIN kódot pedig a K&H mobilbankból tudod lekérdezni.

A K&H mobilbank és a K&H e-bank is rögtön a rendelkezésedre áll, a K&H e-posta felületén elérhetőek újonnan megkötött szerződéseid.

A K&H kényelmi plusz számlacsomag online számlacsomagod 3 hónapig csomagdíj-mentesen használhatod, ezen időszak leteltével pedig javasolni fogunk egy, az időszakban tapasztalt számlavezetési és tranzakciós szokásaidhoz leginkább illeszkedő számlacsomagot.

Online módon azok a 18. életévüket betöltött magyar állampolgárok tudnak számlát nyitni, akik nem minősülnek kiemelt közszereplőnek, vagy nem amerikai adóalanyok.

Ha adataidat NFC-vel nem sikerül beolvasni(2), számládat az alábbi korlátozásokkal használhatod, amelyeket K&H Bankfiókban vagy K&H TeleCenteren(3) keresztül történő videós azonosításban tudsz feloldani:

- nem végezhetsz 10 millió forint összeghatárt meghaladó átutalást, beszedést, kártyás vásárlást
- havonta maximum 300 ezer forint összeget vehetsz fel készpénzben (bankkártya, ATM, postai vagy bankfióki készpénzfelvétel együttes értéke)
- nem lehet a számládra készpénzt befizetni
- kizárólag belföldi forint átutalást kezdeményezhetsz és forintot fogadhatsz

Az online bankszámlanyitás folyamata pár percet vesz igénybe, néhány nagyon egyszerű lépésből áll:

- K&H számlanyitás alkalmazás letöltése
- kapcsolati adatok megadása

- okmány és szelfi fotózás
- személyes adatok ellenőrzése
- nyilatkozatok megadása
- PIN-kód megadása digitális ügyintézéshez
- keretmegállapodás aláírása
- ügyfélismereti kérdőív
- számla és bankkártya szerződés
- K&H mobilbank letöltése és aktiválása

Technikai feltételek:

- K&H számlanyitás alkalmazás - iPhone 5s vagy újabb készülék és minimum iOS 13.0 operációs rendszer

- K&H mobilbank - iPhone 5s vagy újabb készülék és minimum iOS 13.0 operációs rendszer



(1) A számlavezetés (K&H kényelmi plusz számlacsomag online), a betétikártya-szolgáltatás és az ezekhez kapcsolódó internetbanki és mobilalkalmazási szolgáltatások (K&H e-bank, K&H mobilbank, K&H Apple Pay) a K&H Számlanyitás alkalmazással rövid idő alatt, bárhol, bármikor elérhetőek.

(2) Amennyiben nem rendelkezel NFC-s telefonnal vagy NFC képes okmánnyal

(3) Telefonos banki szolgáltatáson
